name: 智代子
text:
手も洗ったし、道具もバッチリ！
樹里ちゃんと果穂は、準備いいかな？
trans: I've washed my hands and prepared the cooking utensils! Juri-chan, Kaho, are you two ready too?

name: 樹里
text:
ああ、問題ねぇよ
アタシらしかいない分、集中してやるぞ
trans: Yeah, everything's looking good here. It's just us here right now, but I'll make sure to concentrate as much as I can.

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ、夏葉さんと凛世さんはいないですけど、
おいしい桜餅を作ってみせます！
trans: Since Natsuha-san and Rinze-san weren't able to be here right now, let's make enough tasty sakura mochi for everyone!

name: 智代子
text: おおっ、張りきってるね、果穂！
trans: Ooo, someone's getting into this!

name: 果穂
text:
『恩返しはしっかり』ってジャスティスレッドも
言ってました！　あたし、レッドの教えを守ります！
trans: "Good works always comes rewarded!" That's what Justice Red always says, and I will do my best to do just that!

name: 樹里
text:
おう、きっとふたりも喜んでくれると思うぜ
ここで作り方覚えちまえば、後で教えたりもできるしな
trans: Nice, I'll definitely be counting on you two. If I'm able to remember how to do this, I might be able to teach it to someone else one day.

name: 智代子
text:
そうそう！　ふたりのためにも、まずは私たちが──
……桜餅マスターを目指そう！
trans: Yup, yup! I'll make sure to do my best to ensure that the we all become sakura mochi masters by the end of today!

name: 果穂
text: 桜餅マスター……！　スゴいっ、カッコいいです！
trans: Sakura mochi masters! That sounds super-duper cool!

name: 果穂
text:
よーしっ！　ちゃんとマスターになってみせるぞー！
それから、夏葉さんと凛世さんにおすそ分けもします！
trans: Let's do this! I know we'll become masters in no time! And later, we can teach Natsuha-san and Rinze-san as well!

name: 智代子
text:
うんうん、いいやる気です！
それじゃあ、桜餅作りスタート！
trans: Yeah, that sounds like a great idea! Then without further ado, let's get this sakura mochi party started!

name: 樹里
text:
……つーかチョコ、この前も自信満々だったけど……
ほんとに作れるんだよな？
trans: By the way, Choco. Before, you kind of came at us all confident about this... but do you actually know how to make sakura mochi?

name: 智代子
text:
もっちろん！　任せてって言ったからには二言はないよ！
ほらアレ、大船に乗ったつもり？　でいて大丈夫！
trans: Of course I can! I already said that you can count on me and I never go back on my word! Don't worry, leave it to me!

name: 果穂
text: あたしも、お母さんのお手伝いしてるので頑張れます！
trans: I'll make sure to help you like I help my mom!

name: 智代子
text: 頼もしいなぁ果穂！もう完璧だねっ
trans: You're so reliable, Kaho! We already have everything set up perfectly.

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ、ちょこ先輩……！
えへへっ
trans: Thanks, Choco-senpai! Ehehe.

name: 樹里
text:
そういうことならまぁいっか
……それで？　最初は何すんだ？
trans: I guess everything should be fine. So, what's the plan? What are we going to do first?

name: 智代子
text:
そだね、まずは桜の葉の塩気を抜いてほしいかなっ
10分ぐらい水につけたら、水気を切ってもらって……
trans: Good question. First, we remove the salt from the sakura leaves by soaking the leaves for about ten minutes before draining it.

name: 智代子
text: 終わったら、あんこの準備をお願い！
trans: Once we're finished with that, can someone prepare the anko?

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ、わかりました！
……樹里ちゃん、お水これぐらいで大丈夫ですかね？
trans:
I got it! 
...Juri-chan, is this enough water?

name: 樹里
text:
ん、いいんじゃねーか
ボウル、ぶつかんないとこに置いとけよ
trans: Yeah, that's fine. Just pour it into this bowl carefully.

name: 果穂
text:
はい！　ありがとうございます！
次はあんこですね！　えっとえっと、作り方は……
trans: Got it! Thank you! Next, we have to work on the anko! Um, um, this should be how you make it...?

name: 智代子
text: ふんふ～ん♪
trans: Hm, hmm, hm, hm, hmmm♪

name: 果穂
text:
わぁ……！　ちょこ先輩、ケーキ屋さんみたいです！
シャカシャカーってするの、上手ですっ
trans: Wow! Choco-senpai, you really look like a real cake shop baker right now! All of your movements look very skilled!

name: 智代子
text:
えへへ、そうかな？
ほら見てー、今はね、白玉粉を溶かしてるんだよ
trans: Ehehe, you really think so? Check it out, the sweet rice flour is melting right now.

name: 智代子
text:
最初はちょびっとだけ水を入れてね、
とろっとしてきたら色をつけて、お砂糖と小麦粉を……
trans: First, pour a bit of water in. After the mixture thickens and the color changes, add sugar and flour.

name: 樹里
text: ほー……手際いいな
trans: Wow... You're really skilled at this.

name: 智代子
text: なになに、樹里ちゃんやっぱり疑ってたの～？
trans: What was that? Could it be that you possibly doubted me～?

name: 樹里
text:
そうじゃねーけどさ！　想像してたより慣れてるし……
……やるなーって思って……
trans: Of course not! It's just that you were a lot more knowledgeable about this than I imagined... I was just really impressed...

name: 智代子
text: えっへへ～、樹里ちゃんに褒められちゃった！
trans: Ehehe～,  I can't believe that Juri-chan just praised me!

name: 果穂
text: ちょこ先輩スゴいです！
trans: You're so cool Choco-senpai!

name: 樹里
text:
こ、これくらいで喜ぶなっての……
っ！ほら、続きやるぞ、続き！
trans: W-Why are you two getting so excited over something like that! Come on, let's keep going! Let's go!

name: 樹里
text:
そろそろ人数分くらいはできたんじゃねーか？
……材料、ちょっと余ったな
trans: We should be deciding how many people we can serve with this, right? We do have some left over ingredients after all.

name: 智代子
text:
なるほど、それなら……
ここはやっぱり、チョコ入りの桜餅、作るしかないよね！
trans: You're right, in that case... We should make some chocolate-filled sakura mochi!

name: 樹里
text:
チョコ入り！？
……いやー、さすがにそれはやめといた方が……
trans: Chocolate-filled!? No, I think that we should probably stop there...

name: 智代子
text:
大丈夫だよ！　上手く使えばきっと美味しくなるって！
たとえばあんこに生チョコを混ぜてみるとか！
trans: It'll be fine! As long as we keep it up, the sakura mochi will definitely turn out well! Let's mix some of this chocolate in with the anko!

name: 智代子
text:
いやでもそれじゃインパクトが……
あ！　いろんな形のチョコで、食感を新しくするとか……？
trans: But I really don't know what kind of effect this will have... Wait! What will happen if we add all different kinds of chocolate...?

name: 樹里
text: き、聞いちゃいねぇ……
trans: She, she's not listening is she...

name: 果穂
text: ちょこ先輩、スッゴく真剣ですっ！
trans: Choco-senpai is really in the zone!

name: 樹里
text:
……はぁ……仕方ねー……
チョコ、食感がなんだって？
trans: ...Man... Whatever... Choco, how's the texture?

name: 果穂
text: あたしたちはどうしたらいいですかっ？
trans: What else can we do right now?

name: 智代子
text:
やっぱり、板チョコは鉄板だと思うんだよね……
ほらっ、こんな感じにしたらどうかなって思ったんだけど！
trans: So, using chocolate bars really do make the mochi rock hard huh... I really wanted to know how it would turn out if I tried!

name: 智代子
text: 感想がほしいです！
trans: I want everyone's honest opinions!

name: 樹里
text: そのまま突っ込んだだけじゃねーか
trans: Are you actually just stuffing all the chocolates in like that?

name: 智代子
text: うっ……！　でも、大事なのは味だし！
trans: Oof! It may look like that, but the taste is the most important part!

name: 果穂
text:
いろんなチョコが入ってますねっ
楽しそうな感じです！
trans: You put in so many different kinds of chocolate. It really looks fun to try out!

name: 智代子
text: 果穂……！
trans: Kaho...!

name: 樹里
text: ある意味勇者だよな果穂は……
trans: You're much braver than me, Kaho...

name: 智代子
text:
よーし！　じゃあ、私、味見してみる！
……あー、む！
trans: Alright! Then I'll try it first! Ahhh, "munch!"

name: 智代子
trans: Mmm!?

name: 果穂
text: ちょこ先輩っ？
trans: Choco-senpai?

name: 樹里
text: おいっ、大丈夫か！？
trans: Are you alright!?

name: 智代子
text:
……お、美味しい……！
ふたりも、ふたりも食べてみて！
trans: I-It's so good...! You guys, you guys have to try it too!

name: 樹里
text: えぇ？　マジかよ？
trans: No way. Really?

name: 智代子
text:
ちゃんとチョコもあんこもいい感じになってるから！
大丈夫！
trans: Trust me! The chocolate goes really well with the anko inside!

name: 樹里
text: じゃ、じゃあ……
trans: A-Alright...

name: 果穂
text: いただきます……！
trans: Let's give it a try...!

name: 樹里
text:
……！！
おぉ、意外にうめーな……
trans:
......!! 
Mmm, this flavor is something else!

name: 果穂
text:
はいっ！
チョコって桜餅にも合っちゃうんですねっ、スゴいです！
trans: Yeah! The chocolate goes really, really well with the sakura mochi!

name: 智代子
text:
でしょっ？　自分でもびっくりだよ～、美味しい……！
ううっどうしよう、これはいっぱい食べちゃう……！
trans: Right? I was also really surprised～ It's so good though! Oh man, what should I do? I might just end up eating all of them...!

name: 智代子
text: はむっ、んむんむ……はむっ……
trans: Nom nom nom...

name: 樹里
text:
あーこら待て待て！　そっちは普通のだ！
夏葉たちにもやるんだろーが！
trans: Hey! Stop, stop! Those are just the normal ones! We left those just for Natsuha and the others!

name: 智代子
text:
ハッ、つ、つい……！
ごめん樹里ちゃん、ありがとう……！
trans: Huh! Just now...! Whoops. Thanks for stopping me, Juri-chan!

name: 樹里
text: 油断も隙もねーんだから
trans: You got to be more careful about this sort of thing.

name: 智代子
text: 甘いものって、食べ始めるとどうしても止まらなくなっちゃうんだよね……
trans: I don't know why, but I just can't seem to stop myself when I start eating sweets.

name: 果穂
text: えへへ、でも、３人でこんなにおいしいならみんなで作ったらもっとですよね！
trans: Ehehe. But if just the three of us were able to make this many goodies, just imagine how many all of us can make together!

name: 智代子
text:
そう！　そうだよね！　夏葉ちゃんと凛世ちゃんにも
味見してもらって……本番はもっとすごいの、作ろうね！
trans: Right! Right! With Natsuha-chan and Rinze-chan here helping us, we should be able to make the sakura mochi even better!
